Description.Text: Dreamhouse Apartments Manchester City West is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Manchester. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room, elevator, smoking area are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, mini bar. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Manchester has to offer by making Dreamhouse Apartments Manchester City West your base.
Dreamhouse Apartments Manchester City West is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests
